comments.body: I *think* this is OK to do... `_sparse_series_to_coo` is the only caller, and it uses `_get_level_number(x)` to go from maybe labels to numbers.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +59,63 @@
        def _get_index_subset_to_coord_dict(index, subset, sort_labels=False):
            ilabels = list(zip(*[index._get_level_values(i) for i in subset]))
            labels_to_i = _get_label_to_i_dict(ilabels,
                                               sort_labels=sort_labels)
